LNG_TEMPLATE_D6A9D08F-B452-4ECB-81AD-678.arabic: Specimen/shipping instructions: - Label sample with patient name, date of collection, and case ID - Send sample cold with a cold/ice pack, and packaged appropriately. - Collect whole blood in a purple top (EDTA) tube – green or red top tubes acceptable if purple not available - Preferred sample volume = 4ml (minimum sample volume = 2ml)
